description: Paramters used in calculation of regression series' points.

children.name: bottomBand
children.description: Percentage below the moving average that should be displayed. 0.1 means 90%. Relative to the calculated value.

children.name: index
children.description: The point index which indicator calculations will base. For example using OHLC data, index=2 means the indicator will be calculated using Low values.

children.name: period
children.description: The base period for indicator calculations. This is the number of data points which are taken into account for the indicator calculations.

children.name: topBand
children.description: Percentage above the moving average that should be displayed. 0.1 means 110%. Relative to the calculated value.
